title: Tomorrow is ours
creator_credit: Jehangir Bhownagary and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: The speaker was a “displaced person” who had lived for eight years with a village in India; he is meeting with the head villagers to explain what had been done in the 1951 first Five Year Plan that was now ending, of the path at “free” India was leading the people on, and the forthcoming Five Year Plan.
